Note:
CUTSCENES/LOCATION (16-bit)
0x3506 = Eletronic Arts
0x4923 = Universal Studios
0x2510 = Intro
0x1500 = Start Menu
0x3822 = 3rd Temple of the Pinnacles
0x3608 = True Ending
0x2600 = Final Result Screen
0x4503 = Credits
0x3303 = Game Over
---------------------------------
0x1313 =  Xena defeated Pactolus
0x5713 =  Xena defeated King Valerian's army
0x5814 = Xena defeated Minotaur and rescued Gabrielle
0x5715 = Gabrielle was kidnapped by the renegade amazons
0x1416 = Kallabrax sends Xena to Underworld
0x4817 = Xena asks Hades for help
0x1419 =  Xena arrives the Village of T'ir Na
0x3520 = Xena defeated Yat and colleted the Lyre of Orpheus
0x4221 = Xena watches Kallabrax preparing Gabrielle for a ritual
0x2623 = Kallabrax turns into a beast
0x3822 = The temple collapses killing the beast
0x4506 = Xena saves Gabrielle

0x01 = On

POWER (16-bit)
Power Effect time
0x1c2, decreasing... , 0x001 = active
0x000 = inactive

SELECT (8-bit)
(Press X to activate) time
0x3b, decreasing... , 0x01 = Active
0x00 = Inactive

0x03=No

ENEMIES DEFEATED (8-bit)
-counts only when the enemy disappears
-killing with frost biter will not count

RESURRECTION JEWEL (8-bit)
+0x01
Restores Xena's life and returns her to this location!

HAND OF ZEUS (8-bit)
+0x01
Give your enemies the shock of their lives!

SUPER CHAKRAM (8-bit)
+0x01
This Chakraim will seek and destroy nearby enemies

PROMETHEAN BLADE (8-bit)
+0x01
Give your enemies a lesson in firemarking!

GOLDEN SHIELD (8-bit)
+0x01
Xena becomes invulnerable to attack!

FROST BITER (8-bit)
+0x01
Freeze your enemies in ther tracks!

ARMOR UPGRADE (8-bit)
+0x01
Reduces the amount of damage Xena Receives from enemies!

SWORD UPGRADE (8-bit)
+0x01
Increase the amount of damage Xena inflicts upon enemies!
